mapper.select: SELECT BO.idx idx , BO.board_id board_id , BO.class_id class_id , SUBSTR(BO.detail,1,10) title , BO.user_id user_id , US.user_nm user_nm , BO.detail detail , BO.type type , BO.step step , BO.indent indent , CM.idx cm_idx , CM.detail comments , CM.user_id cm_author FROM BOARD BO JOIN CLASS CL ON BO.class_id = CL.class_id JOIN USER US ON BO.user_id = US.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMENTS CM ON BO.idx = CM.ref_idx WHERE CL.class_id=#{class_id}
